item.title: Need 1 piece of help for my mini game!
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

just put this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4024 == true){//coded by Zee_best npcId = 1480; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4024 == false){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

put that below public boolean process

item.title: Need 1 piece of help for my mini game!
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

hi, ive made a new mini game but im not talking about that it works fine with pnpc but i want people to use these staffs

this is what i have done

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4024 == true){//coded by Zee_best npcId = 1480; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4024 == false){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

also

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4024) { // monkey gregree(ninja) npcId = 1480; isNpc = true; }

i need it to turn me into monkey like the npc i supplyed

thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2007, 02:01:19 PM[/size][hr]anyone got a fix for me please?

Read full topic
